TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebBrowserPermissionLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Web 瀏覽器的使用權限等級。

span.span: Specifies the permission level for a Web browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個列舉來設定屬性類別。Use this enumeration to set the property of the class. Safe 權限層級會限制下列 Web 瀏覽器作業。The Safe permission level restricts the following Web browser operations. - 無法建立快顯視窗，透過網頁瀏覽器控制項。A pop-up window cannot be created over the Web browser control. - Web 瀏覽器控制項可以只巡覽到它的來源網站。The Web browser control can only be navigated to its site of origin. - 降低的安全性設定的網頁瀏覽器控制項。The security settings of the Web browser control are reduced. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何要求呼叫程式碼具有無限制的權限來建立網頁瀏覽器控制項。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted permission to create a Web browser control. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel None = int32(0)

summary.span: 無法將框架巡覽至 HTML 的 Web 瀏覽器。

span.span: A Web browser that cannot navigate frames to HTML.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel Safe = int32(1)

summary.span: 可將框架安全巡覽至 HTML，但有數項限制的 Web 瀏覽器。

span.span: A Web browser that can safely navigate frames to HTML but with several restrictions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel Unrestricted = int32(2)

summary.span: 可無限制地巡覽的 Web 瀏覽器。

span.span: A Web browser that can navigate without restrictions.
